title: 'Displacement': The Frustrations, Fears And Absurdities Of A Cruise Upended
teaser: When Lucy Knisley agreed to go on a Caribbean cruise with her grandparents, she didn't know she'd spend 10 days basically keeping them alive. She writes about it in her new cartoon memoir.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
